A Nauber Máquinas é uma empresa Brasilei: Nauber Máquinas is a Brazilian company, headquartered in the city of Schroeder, Santa Catarina, 8 km from the city of Jaraguá do Sul, and 25 km from the city of Joinville. Our goal is to develop and seek new technologies that provide significant improvements in the quality and performance of civil construction processes. With globalization and constant competition in an increasingly competitive market, there is no better way to become more competitive than to improve processes to reduce costs. Our line of Airless equipment, Sanders, Vacuum Cleaners and Accessories are designed for professionals who seek to optimize their workforce and perform productivity without compromising quality. Nauber equipment and accessories are produced under total quality supervision, and 100% of the equipment is tested before shipping to our customers, thus guaranteeing final quality and purchase satisfaction through state-of-the-art equipment.
